data.quote: We must become the change we want to see in the world.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: YOU are your best project.
data.author: Oliver Schneider

data.quote: Start with big dreams and make life worth living.
data.author: Stephen Richards

data.quote: The future genius is planted today.
data.author: Minevo Academy

data.quote: Be thankful for what you have and you will end up having more.
data.author: Oprah Winfrey

data.quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
data.author: Charles R. Swindoll

data.quote: Your positive action combined with positive thinking results in success.
data.author: Shiv Khera

data.quote: If you get up in the morning and think the future is going to be better, it is a bright day.
data.author: Elon Musk

data.quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
data.author: Elon Musk

data.quote: Of all things I hold in high regards, rules are not one of them.
data.author: Frank Underwood

data.quote: Take risks now and do something bold. You won't regret it.
data.author: Elon Musk

data.quote: If you don't like how the table is set, turn over the table.
data.author: Frank Underwood

data.quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count, it's the life in your years.
data.author: Abraham Lincoln

data.quote: Believe you can and your're halfway there.
data.author: Theodore Roosevelt

data.quote: A winner is a dreamer who never gives up.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: Creativity is contagious, pass it on.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: You are stronger then you think.
data.author: Unkown

data.quote: You get in life what you have the courage to ask for.
data.author: Oprah Winfrey

data.quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap. But by the seeds you plant.
data.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

data.quote: Someone's sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.
data.author: Warren Buffet

data.quote: Without passion, you don't have energy. Without energy, you have nothing.
data.author: Warren Buffet
